item.title: Version 1.2.12
item.description:
What's New

Version 1.2.12: Add Always On Top feature and improve update dialog visibility

  • Add pin button to Settings and Preferences windows for always-on-top functionality
  • Implement SPUStandardUserDriverDelegate to bring update dialogs to front
  • Ensure Sparkle update notifications are visible for menu bar apps
  • Bump version to 1.2.12
